TEXT.TITLE: MAGMA LOWERS COPPER PRICE 0.25 CT TO 65.50 CTS
TEXT.BODY: Magma Copper Co, a subsidiary of Newmont Mining Corp, said it is lowering its copper cathode price by 0.25 cent to 65.50 cents a lb, effective immediately. Reuter
